subject: Urgent: API Credentials Exposure
body: We've identified an issue where API credentials were shared through unsecured internal channels. Please refrain from sharing sensitive information, such as API keys or database URIs, on Slack or similar platforms. Ensure you follow the secure communication policies, and rotate any exposed keys immediately.

attachments.name: credentials_exposure_report.pdf
attachments.content_summary: Details of the API credentials exposure, including affected services and recommended actions.

subject: Meeting Scheduled: Project Kick-off
body:
Hello team,

We have scheduled the kick-off meeting for our new project. Please find the details below:

Date: November 15, 2023
Time: 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM
Location: Conference Room A

Agenda:
1. Introduction
2. Objectives and goals
3. Roles and responsibilities
4. Timeline and milestones
5. Q&A

Please review the attached agenda document prior to the meeting.

Best regards,
[NAME]
